content: वसंतः {@--1@} The spring, vernal season (comprising the two months चैत्र and वैशाख); मधुमाधवौ वसंतः <ls>Suśr.</ls>; सर्वं प्रिये चारुतरं वसंते <ls>Rs. 6. 2</ls>; विहरति हरिरिह सरसवसंते <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Spring personified as a deity and regarded as a companion of Kāmadeva; सुहृदः पश्य वसंतकिं स्थितं <ls>Ku. 4. 27.</ls> {@--3@} Dysentery. {@--4@} Smallpox. {@--5@} (In dramas) A nickname for the Vidūṣaka or buffoon.
